poem:
Title: "In the Currency of Cloth"

In the pulsar heart of finance, she spins -
Shein, the needle-threaded goddess of growth,
Stitching gambles into gowns, yielding dreams
Up from frugal cloth. The shrewd thunder
Of China's engines roars, as 4.5% forecasts echo,
A hymn sung in the orchestral hum of looms
Where economy and industry, in seamless dance,
Weave tomorrow's prosperity in threads of chance.
prompt: You are the poet Simon Armitage. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Online fashion group Shein expected to file prospectus for London listing soon – business live 7.56am BST Moody's raises China's growth forecast to 4.5% for 2024 Credit rating agency Moody’s has raised China’s growth forecast for 2024 to 4.5% from 4.0%, Reuters reports. Moody’s noted that China’s post-pandemic manufacturing and export-focused growth strategy is taking shape, with trade and manufacturing activity supporting growth in the first quarter of this year. But, 4.5% would still be". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
